creator: miki@ceti.pl
text:
There are two copies of default home page (index.html and index.jsp). They
differ. The html version does not contain version number. And they both contain
wrong link to documentation (link in the page body is wrong, link in left column
is correct). Link is /tomcat-docs while documentation is installed with /docs
prefix.

creator: kamikaze@kuoi.asui.uidaho.edu
text: Most of the links on http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/index.html go nowhere.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Most of the links on http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/index.html
> go nowhere.

Huh? I just went there, and everything looks kosher. Every link I clicked went
somewhere reasonable.
creator: shankarunni@netscape.net
fhanik@apache.org
text: This works for me for the index.jsp page
